mod.name: The Gatherer
mod.credits:
Rita-Bernstein - Character art, ZHS translation
Jedi - RUS translation
MappyTheKat - Old character splash art
mod.description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v1.0.6 (2020-11-30)
- Update for Slay the Spire v2.2
- Mind Search now considers your current energy while determining Lesser Energy Potion probability.

v1.0.7 (2021-10-13)
- Fixed crash on MacOS
- Localization updated for ENG, KOR, RUS.

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.

cards.name: Light!
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Draw a card.
Increase the damage of all Shadow! in your hand by 8.

cards.name: Light!+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Draw a card.
Increase the damage of all Shadow! in your hand by 11.

cards.name: Shadow!
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Draw a card.
Increase the Block of all Light! in your hand by 7.

cards.name: Shadow!+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Draw a card.
Increase the Block of all Light! in your hand by 10.

cards.name: Thrower
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal damage equal to the remaining Block at the start of this turn. Exhaust.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.name: Thrower+
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal damage equal to the remaining Block at the start of this turn +2. Exhaust.
(Deals 2 damage.)

cards.name: Glitched
cards.description:
Retain.
Exhaust.
While in your hand, []Upgrade Bag's power is disabled.

cards.name: Centralize
cards.description:
Fetch 2 cards from your draw pile.
gatherer:Once: Upgrade 2 random cards in hand; Fetched cards get priority.

cards.name: Centralize+
cards.description:
Fetch 2 cards from your draw pile.
gatherer:Twice: Upgrade 2 random cards in hand; Fetched cards get priority.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Flower Whip
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 2 times.
Can be Upgraded 3 times.

cards.name: Flower Whip+1
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 2 times.
Can be Upgraded 2 more times.

cards.name: Flower Whip+2
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage 2 times.
Can be Upgraded 1 more time.

cards.name: Flower Whip+3
cards.description: Deal 6 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Spare Bottle <Norm>
cards.description: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 4 Block and deal 4 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Spare Bottle+ <Norm>
cards.description: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 6 Block and deal 6 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Acidic Spray
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Deal 4 damage for each debuff on the target. Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Acidic Spray+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Deal 6 damage for each debuff on the target. Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Aroma Protection
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Aroma Protection+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Bambu Sword
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Play a []Strike or Defend from your hand with no cost.

cards.name: Bambu Sword+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage. Play a []Strike or Defend from your hand with no cost.

cards.name: Careful Strike
cards.description: Deal 11 damage. Put up to 1 card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Careful Strike+
cards.description: Deal 15 damage. Put up to 1 card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Collector's Shot
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 1.5 times the number of gatherer:Unique cards with no duplicates in your deck.

cards.name: Collector's Shot+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of gatherer:Unique cards with no duplicates in your deck.

cards.name: Convert
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
If it is Uncommon,
gain 25 Block.
If it is Rare,
gain 35 Block.

cards.name: Convert+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
If it is Uncommon,
gain 25 Block.
If it is Rare,
gain 35 Block.

cards.name: Drug Power
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. If you used a Potion this turn, gain the effect of the last used Potion.

cards.name: Drug Power+
cards.description: Deal 18 damage. If you used a Potion this turn, gain the effect of the last used Potion.

cards.name: Energy Basket
cards.description:
Gain 2 gatherer:Lesser Energy Potions.
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Energy Basket+
cards.description:
Gain 3 gatherer:Lesser Energy Potions.
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flower Falling
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Exhaust.
Can be Upgraded 3 times.

cards.name: Flower Falling+1
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Exhaust.
Can be Upgraded 2 more times.

cards.name: Flower Falling+2
cards.description:
Deal 22 damage.
Exhaust.
Can be Upgraded 1 more time.

cards.name: Flower Falling+3

Deal 22 damage.
Heal 4 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flower Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Can be Upgraded 3 times.

cards.name: Flower Shield+1
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Can be Upgraded 2 more times.

cards.name: Flower Shield+2
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Can be Upgraded 1 more time.

cards.name: Flower Shield+3
cards.description: Gain 14 Block.

cards.name: Fragile Hammer
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Deal 12 damage to a random enemy other than the target.

cards.name: Fragile Hammer+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage. Deal 16 damage to a random enemy other than the target.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Frenzy+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Gather Material
cards.description: Put 3 random cards from your draw pile into your hand. Prioritizes cards not already in your hand.

cards.name: Gather Material+
cards.description: Put 4 random cards from your draw pile into your hand. Prioritizes cards not already in your hand.

cards.name: Potential Slash
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 8 + half of your missing HP.

cards.name: Potential Slash+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 14 + half of your missing HP.

cards.name: Quick Synthesis
cards.description:
Gain 1 random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Quick Synthesis+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Gain 1 random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Save Valuables
cards.description: Choose up to 3 cards from your discard pile. Shuffle them into your draw pile.

cards.name: Save Valuables+

cards.name: Scherry Throw
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Scherry Throw+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Snatch
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
gatherer:Once: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

cards.name: Snatch+
cards.description:
Deal 10 Damage.
gatherer:Twice: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

cards.name: Tactical Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Tactical Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Tree Growth
cards.description:
Next turn, gain 5 Block.
Gain 10 Block 2 turns later.

cards.name: Tree Growth+

Gain 8 Block.
gatherer:Once: Draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards.

cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
gatherer:Twice: Draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Alchemy Trial
cards.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, gain a gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion depending on the 10th card played.

cards.name: Alchemy Trial+
cards.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, gain a gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion depending on the 10th card played.

cards.name: Balanced Growth
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain up to 1 Strength or Dexterity until they are equal.

cards.name: Balanced Growth+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain up to 2 Strength or Dexterity until they are equal.

cards.name: Big Pouch
cards.description: Draw 2 Cards. Gain Block equal to the total cost of your cards in hand.

cards.name: Big Pouch+
cards.description: Draw 3 Cards. Gain Block equal to the total cost of your cards in hand.

cards.name: Duality <ATK>
cards.description: Deal 18 damage. Retain. When Retained, its tag switches between <ATK> and <DEF>.

cards.name: Duality+ <ATK>
cards.description: Deal 22 damage. Retain. When Retained, its tag switches between <ATK> and <DEF>.

cards.name: Duplicator
cards.description:
Gain effects of all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Duplicator+
cards.description: Gain effects of all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions.

cards.name: Echo of Nature
cards.description: Gain 3 Block X times. Deal 4 Damage X times.

cards.name: Echo of Nature+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block X times. Deal 6 Damage X times.

cards.name: Enchant
cards.description: Choose a Strike in your hand to give it Cost + 1, Damage + 14 and boosts special effect if it has.

cards.name: Enchant+
cards.description: Choose a Strike in your hand to give it Cost + 1, Damage + 18 and boosts special effect if it has.

cards.name: Feeling Fine
cards.description: Whenever you use 3 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.

cards.name: Feeling Fine+
cards.description: Whenever you use 3 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.

cards.name: Flower Beam
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to the target, then deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Can be Upgraded 3 times.

cards.name: Flower Beam+1
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to the target, then deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Can be Upgraded 2 more times.

cards.name: Flower Beam+2
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to the target, then deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
Can be Upgraded 1 more time.

cards.name: Flower Beam+3
cards.description: Deal 12 damage to the target, then deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Flower Power
cards.description:
Gain 2 Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, Draw 2 cards.
Can be Upgraded 3 times.

cards.name: Flower Power+1
cards.description:
Gain 2 Weak and Frail. At the start of your turn, Draw 2 cards.
Can be Upgraded 2 more times.

cards.name: Flower Power+2
cards.description:
Gain 2 Weak. At the start of your turn, Draw 2 cards.
Can be Upgraded 1 more time.

cards.name: Flower Power+3
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Fruit Force
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 15 % of your Max HP.
When obtained, raise your Max HP by 4.

cards.name: Fruit Force+
cards.description:

cards.name: Glowing Plant
cards.description:

When obtained, add a Light! and a Shadow! to your deck.

cards.name: Glowing Plant+

When obtained, add a Light! and a Shadow! to your deck.

cards.name: Herbalism
cards.description: Gain [E] for each card in your hand that costs 2 or more.

cards.name: Herbalism+
cards.description: Gain [E] for each card in your hand that costs 2 or more.

cards.name: Liquidism
cards.description: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.

cards.name: Liquidism+
cards.description: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.

cards.name: Mining Strike
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. For every 10 unblocked damage, gain 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Mining Strike+

cards.name: Misfortune
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Gain up to 1 gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion with debuff effect that the enemy already has.

cards.name: Misfortune+

cards.name: Nutrients
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.

cards.name: Nutrients+

cards.name: Odd Spoils

cards.name: Odd Spoils+

cards.name: Pollute
cards.description: Next turn, apply 2 Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Pollute+

cards.name: Polymorphism
cards.description: Deal damage equal to number of other cards in your hand. If they are all gatherer:Unique, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Polymorphism+

cards.name: Recipe Change
cards.description: Choose 1 from ALL gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions. Replace all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions with it. Exhaust.

cards.name: Recipe Change+
cards.description: Choose 1 from ALL gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions. Replace all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions with it. Exhaust.

cards.name: Recovery Herb
cards.description:
Considered as using a Potion. Heal 10 % of your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Recovery Herb+
cards.description:
Considered as using a Potion. Heal 10 % of your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rotten Stipe
cards.description:
Deal ? damage.
Apply ?.
(Each Rotten Stipe
has randomly chosen
damage and debuff.)

cards.name: Rotten Stipe+
cards.description:
Deal ? damage.
Apply ?.
(Each Rotten Stipe
has randomly chosen
damage and debuff.)

cards.name: Scent of Rosmari
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Choose 2 cards to Retain. If they end up discarded, return them to your hand next turn.

cards.name: Scent of Rosmari+
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. Choose 3 cards to Retain. If they end up discarded, return them to your hand next turn.

cards.name: Scroll Of Wall
cards.description: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.

cards.name: Scroll Of Wall+
cards.description: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and give 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Sealed Bomb
cards.description: Deal 50 damage. While in your hand, using a Potion decreases its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Sealed Bomb+
cards.description: Deal 60 damage. While in your hand, using a Potion decreases its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Smart Maneuver
cards.description: Enemy deals half damage this turn. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Swift Potion.

cards.name: Smart Maneuver+
cards.description:
Enemy deals half damage this turn. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Swift Potion.
Retain.

cards.name: Solidify
cards.description: Repeat until your Sack is full: Spend 5 Block to gain a gatherer:Lesser Block Potion.

cards.name: Solidify+
cards.description: Repeat until your Sack is full: Spend 4 Block to gain a gatherer:Lesser Block Potion.

cards.name: Transmute
cards.description: Transform a card from your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Transmute+
cards.description: Transform a card from your hand. It is Upgraded and costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Upgrade Bag
cards.description: Shuffle a Glitched in your draw pile. Your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions are 100% more potent.

cards.name: Upgrade Bag+
cards.description: Add a Glitched+ in your discard pile. Your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions are 100% more potent.

cards.name: Uplift
cards.description: Each turn, the first card you play that costs 2 or more has Refund 1.

cards.name: Uplift+
cards.description: Each turn, the first 2 cards you play that cost 2 or more have Refund 1.

cards.name: Venom Barrier
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 3 Poison to the attacker.

cards.name: Venom Barrier+
cards.description: Gain 14 Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 3 Poison to the attacker.

cards.name: Withering Strike
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. Enemy loses 1 Strength.

cards.name: Withering Strike+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Enemy loses 1 Strength.

cards.name: Black Tea
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.
Startup: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

cards.name: Black Tea+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.
Startup: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

cards.name: Bomber Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain a gatherer:LEP. All future gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions become gatherer:LEP and raise all gatherer:LEPs' damage by 1 when used.

cards.name: Bomber Form+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain a gatherer:LEP. All future gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions become gatherer:LEP and raise all gatherer:LEPs' damage by 2 when used.

cards.name: Bulldoze
cards.description: Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies for every 4 gatherer:Unique cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Bulldoze+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies for every 3 gatherer:Unique cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Colorful Garden
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block per gatherer:Unique card you played this turn.

cards.name: Colorful Garden+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block per gatherer:Unique card you played this turn.

cards.name: Cursed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
gatherer:Once: Enemy loses 15 Strength this turn. When obtained, become Cursed - Normality.

cards.name: Cursed Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 35 damage.
gatherer:Twice: Enemy loses 15 Strength this turn. When obtained, become Cursed - Normality.

cards.name: Examine
cards.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your draw pile. Play one and discard others.

cards.name: Examine+
cards.description: Look at the top 5 cards of your draw pile. Play one and discard others.

cards.name: Finishing Strike
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. If the enemy has less HP than you, hit 2 times instead.

cards.name: Finishing Strike+
cards.description: Deal 16 damage. If the enemy has less HP than you, hit 2 times instead.

cards.name: Flaming Bottle
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Fire Potion.

cards.name: Flaming Bottle+
cards.description: Deal 20 damage. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Fire Potion.

cards.name: Grow Book
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block, or permanently replace this with 1 of 3 cards from other color.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grow Book+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block, or permanently replace this with 1 of 3 Upgraded cards from other color.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heart to Fruit
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 3. Exhaust.

cards.name: Heart to Fruit+
cards.description:
Deal 22 damage.
If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 4. Exhaust.

cards.name: Lucky Clover
cards.description: Gain 1 Dexterity for each gatherer:Flower cards in your deck.

cards.name: Lucky Clover+
cards.description: Gain 1 Dexterity for each gatherer:Flower cards in your deck.

cards.name: Mind Search
cards.description:
Choose 2 out of 4 gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions to gain with the help of Gatherer's thought.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mind Search+
cards.description:
Choose 2 out of 4 gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions to gain with great help of Gatherer's thought.
Retain. Exhaust.

cards.name: Overflowing
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overflowing+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Energy is conserved for the next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Photoscythe
cards.description: Innate. Upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards for the combat. Deal damage equal to 3 X number of them. Exhaust.

cards.name: Photoscythe+
cards.description: Innate. Upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards for the combat. Deal damage equal to 4 X number of them. Exhaust.

cards.name: Poison Mastery
cards.description:
Gain a gatherer:Lesser Poison Potion.
Poison damage is increased by 100%.

cards.name: Poison Mastery+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain a gatherer:Lesser Poison Potion.
Poison damage is increased by 100%.

cards.name: Scroll of Purity
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you use a Potion, draw 1 card and Exhaust up to 1 card.

cards.name: Scroll of Purity+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you use a Potion, draw 2 cards and Exhaust up to 2 cards.

cards.name: Stone Fence
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add 1 Thrower to your hand.

cards.name: Stone Fence+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add 1 Thrower+ to your hand.

relics.name: Alchemy Bag
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain a random gatherer:Lesser Potion.
relics.flavorText: A mysterious bag with the power of recurring potions.

relics.name: Mist Generator
relics.description: The amount of enemy's Poison is not reduced each turn if 8 or less.
relics.flavorText: The mist can be deadly for some creatures.

relics.name: Floral Egg
relics.description: Upon pick up, upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards. Whenever you add a gatherer:Flower card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Eggs like flowers. Or they are eggs like flowers.

relics.name: Flying Fruit
relics.description: When you Exhaust 1/3/6/10 gatherer:Unique cards after picking this up, raise your Max HP by 4.

relics.name: Leftovers
relics.description: Every time you use 4 Potions in a combat, gain a random gatherer:Lesser Potion.
relics.flavorText: How alchemists make new material from leftovers is a mystery.

relics.name: Explorer's Path
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn for the next 3 combats.
You can now see the pick ratio of cards in the reward screen.
Choose the lowest-picked card to gain [E] for 1 more combat.
Synergy: Question Card
relics.flavorText: Sometimes it's worth to explore the worst path.

relics.name: Miracle Bag
relics.description:
Replaces Alchemy Bag.
Upon pickup, gain 1 regular Potion Slot.
At the start of each combat, obtain a rare Potion to your regular Potion Slot.

keywords.name: Alchemy Trial
keywords.description:
Attack - Lesser Fire or Explosive Potion
Skill - Lesser Block or Energy Potion
Power - Lesser Strength or Dexterity Potion
Other - Lesser Weak or Fear Potion

keywords.name: Gatherer:flower
keywords.description: Card containing Flower in its name. It can be upgraded 3 times, where 3rd upgrade is special.

keywords.name: LEP
keywords.description: Stands for Lesser Explosive Potion, which normally deals 6 damage to all enemies.

keywords.name: Lesser Potion
keywords.description: A "Lesser" version of regular potion which is gained to your Sack.

keywords.name: Lesser Block Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which gains 8 Block when used.

keywords.name: Lesser Energy Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which gives you 1 energy when used.

keywords.name: Lesser Fear Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which applies 2 Vulnerable to an enemy.

keywords.name: Lesser Fire Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which deals 10 damage to an enemy.

keywords.name: Lesser Poison Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which applies 4 Poison to an enemy.

keywords.name: Lesser Swift Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which draws 2 cards when used.

keywords.name: Lesser Weak Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which applies 2 Weak to an enemy.

keywords.name: Once
keywords.description: Only activates when you play this card first time in the combat.

keywords.name: Twice
keywords.description: Only activates for the first two times you play this card in combat. Becomes Once after one use.

keywords.name: Gatherer:unique
keywords.description: Cards with different name (except for upgrades) are considered unique.
